caption.p: Antiallodynic effect of topical application of NanoBEO (1 mg/mouse) on partial sciatic nerve ligation (PSNL). Empty cream (1 mg/mouse) has been used as a control and this has failed to affect PSNL-induced mechanical allodynia. Each value represents mean Â± SEM ( n = 10). Values of p < 0.05 have been considered statistically significant. Improvement over control of 58.76%, ** p < 0.01.
